term.title: surface excess energy

item.text: Defined by: U σ = U- U α- U β = U- V α U and V β satisfy the condition V α + V β = V, the total volume of the system. (U m α V m α) and (U m β V m β) are the energy densities in the two bulk phases where U m α and U m β are the mean molar energies and V m α and V m β are the mean molar volumes of the two phases.

item.alttext: U σ = U- U α- U β = U- V α U
